usage.cn: 要用心去爱你的邻居,不过不要让她的老公知道.
usage.eng: Love the neighbor. But don't get caught.

usage.cn: 为什么幸福总是擦肩而过,偶尔想你的时候….就让….回忆来陪我.
usage.eng: Why I have never caught the happiness? Whenever I want you ,I will be accompanied by the memory of you.

usage.cn: 生活中有很多事物会吸引你的眼球，但只有为数不多的事物会打动你的心灵......去追求后者！
usage.eng: There are many things in life that will catch your eyes, but only a few will catch your heart... Pursue those!
